Title: No Small Affair
Writer: Craig Bolotin (screenplay by), Terence Mulcahy (screenplay by), Craig Bolotin (story by)
Actors: Jon Cryer, Demi Moore, George Wendt, Peter Frechette
Plot: The 16 years old amateur photographer Charles accidentally takes a photo of Laura - and falls in love with her, when he develops the picture. He finds out that she works as singer in a bar, but is about to be thrown out. Although rejected at first by the 23 years old, he wants to help her and starts an ad campaign behind her back... with unexpected results.
